704745f-a.folder: Hamilton Avenue & Van Brunt Street, Brooklyn, NY
704745f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: Hamilton Avenue - Van Brunt Street
704745f-a.text:
Hamilton Avenue, north from Van Brunt Street. The three buildings on the right on Nos. 1 to 5 Carroll Street, the one on the extreme right (No. 5) being at the corner of Carroll Street. On the left is the India Wharf Warehouse, at Conover Street.

October 21, 1939
P.L. Sperr

View r is north from Summit Street. Many of the buildings on the east side (right) of the avenue were later razed to make way for the construction of Gowanus Parkway

P.L Sperr
October 21, 1939

707162f-a.folder: Van Brunt St. & Hamilton Ave., Brooklyn, NY
707162f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: Van Brunt St. - Hamilton Ave.
707162f-a.text:
Van Brunt Street, east side, north from Hamilton Avenue. The house on the right is No. 63 the latter thoroughfare.
October 21, 1939

P.L. Sperr

Van Brunt Street, north from Carroll Street
